update() - Method in class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.controller.SearchController
Updates the category and priority drop-down methods and presets them to any, and shows the previously shown tasks and sorts them based on the category.
update(Category, String) - Method in class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.repository.CategoryRepository
This method updates a category that already exists.
update(Priority, String) - Method in class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.repository.PriorityRepository
This method updates a priority that already exists.

This method updates a task that already exists in the repository.

This method updates the categories combo box as well as the category maps.

This method updates the deadline shown in the notification management window.
updateMediaLabTables() - Method in class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.controller.MediaLabController
This method is used to update properly the tables in MediaLabAssistant, but to also update tasks and priorities in the task management window.

This method updates the priorities combo box as well as the priority maps.
updateTasks() - Method in class org.taskmanager.taskmanager.controller.TaskController
This method informs the mediaLabController it should update its tables, then resets the task table.
